speakingTests.title: Part 1: Personal Information
speakingTests.description: Basic personal questions about familiar topics

questions.question: Can you tell me about your hometown?
questions.instructions: Speak for about 2 minutes about your hometown, including where it is, what it's like, and what you like about it.

questions.question: What do you do for work or study?
questions.instructions: Describe your job or studies, what you do, and how long you've been doing it.

questions.question: Do you enjoy reading books?
questions.instructions: Talk about your reading habits and preferences.

questions.question:
Describe a place you would like to visit. You should say:

- Where this place is
- How you know about this place
- What you would do there
- And explain why you would like to visit this place
questions.instructions: You have 1 minute to prepare and 2 minutes to speak. Make notes if you wish.

questions.question: How has technology changed the way people work?
questions.instructions: Discuss the impact of technology on work patterns and productivity.

questions.question: Do you think technology makes people more or less social?
questions.instructions: Consider both positive and negative effects of technology on social interaction.

questions.question: What technological developments do you think will be important in the future?
questions.instructions: Share your predictions about future technology trends.

speakingTests.title: Full Test: Education & Learning
speakingTests.description: Complete IELTS Speaking test covering all parts

questions.question: What subjects did you study at school?
questions.instructions: Talk about your school subjects and which ones you enjoyed.

questions.question: Do you prefer studying alone or with others?
questions.instructions: Explain your study preferences and why.

questions.question:
Describe a teacher who has influenced you. You should say:

- Who this teacher was
- What subject they taught
- How they taught
- And explain why they influenced you
questions.instructions: You have 1 minute to prepare and 2 minutes to speak.

questions.question: How do you think education has changed in recent years?
questions.instructions: Discuss changes in teaching methods and technology in education.

questions.question: What role do you think parents should play in their children's education?
questions.instructions: Consider the balance between school and home education.

speakingTests.title: Part 1: Daily Life
speakingTests.description: Questions about daily routines and activities

questions.question: What do you usually do on weekends?
questions.instructions: Describe your typical weekend activities and why you enjoy them.

questions.question: Do you like cooking?
questions.instructions: Talk about your cooking skills and food preferences.

speakingTests.title: Part 2: Describe an Event
speakingTests.description: Cue card about a memorable event

questions.question:
Describe a memorable event in your life. You should say:

- When this event happened
- Where it took place
- What happened
- And explain why it was memorable for you
questions.instructions: You have 1 minute to prepare and 2 minutes to speak. Make notes if you wish.
